content: Cropping pattern & performance of the Farm.
Insight: To asses the seasonal cropping pattern in a year (Kharif & Rabi)
Crops grown in the farm in different seasons
Market Price or Minimum Support Price (Set by Central Government) in a season.

Categorical index (upto farm level) to evaluate the risk based on crop performance and potential crop damage geenrated for a specific season ranked as Good, Average & Below average.

Insight: Crop performance indicates the performance of the crop grown in the farm basis the yield and revenue potential
Crop Yield ( potential Farm Yield Vs Threshold District Yield)

Potential Yield is the maximum yield which could reached by a crop in given environemnt per unit area. The threshold yield (TY) or Guaranteed Yield for a crop is the moving average based on five years avearage yield.

Insight: Crop Yield Compares the yield/unit area at farm vis a vis district to determine the productivity level of the farm
Parameters affecting the farming in the region & availability of market for sale of end produce.

An agricultural market where the sales and purchase of agricultural commodities are done.

Insight: Connectivity to Market for sale of the end produce.
Insight: Ease in transfering the farm produce from field to nearest market
Insight: Drought prone or Drought resistent region
Insight: Extent of farming & farming practices

The air temprature measured in a particular sub-district.

Insight: Temprature conducive for cropping.

The Sub-agro ecological zone is a land unit represented accurately or precisely in term of major climate and growing period which is climatically suitable for a certain range of crops for cultivations.

Insight: Agro-ecological sub-zones to understand overall weather conditions & agricultural practices
Index to measure overall prosperity of a region, considering night light index, latest census data & GDP, measured on a sacle of 0-1.
Insight: Pattern of Rainfall & Groundwater condition to fullfill the Irrigation requirement of the farm
Average rainfall and rainfall pattern in the last 10 years
